Type.Name: PropMode

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PropMode extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Describes how existing data is combined with new data.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.PropMode Append = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The new data is appended to the existing data.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.PropMode Prepend = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The new data is prepended to the existing data.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gdk.PropMode Replace = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The new data replaces the existing data.
